code: import finalData from"../../dataFinal.json";import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var dishesSlice=createSlice({name:"dishes",initialState:{value:finalData.dishes},reducers:{filterDishes:function filterDishes(state,action){var filterType=action.payload;switch(filterType){case"all":state.value=finalData.dishes;break;case"popular":state.value=finalData.dishes;state.value=state.value.filter(function(dish){return dish.isPopular===true;});break;case"breakfast":state.value=finalData.dishes;state.value=state.value.filter(function(dish){return dish.category==="breakfast";});break;case"launch":state.value=finalData.dishes;state.value=state.value.filter(function(dish){return dish.category==="launch";});break;case"dinner":state.value=finalData.dishes;state.value=state.value.filter(function(dish){return dish.category==="dinner";});break;default:state.value=state.value;}}}});var filterDishes=dishesSlice.actions.filterDishes;export{filterDishes};export default dishesSlice.reducer;
